') const htmlG = shallow( Align Align Align ) expect(htmlG.html()).to.equal('

') }) })

export { default as Grid } from './Grid'
export { default as GridItem } from './GridItem'

import * as React from 'react' import cx from 'classnames' import IGrid from './types' /** * Styles */ import './Grid.scss' /** * A grid system using CSS Grid */ const Grid: React.FunctionComponent = ({ className, gutter, matchHeights, children }) => (
{children}
) export default Grid
export { default as Header } from './Header'
export { default as Text } from './Text'

import * as React from 'react'
import cx from 'classnames'
import IText from './types'

/**
 * Styles
 */
import './Text.scss'

const Text: React.FunctionComponent<IText.IProps> = (props) => {
  const { className, type, tag = 'p', children } = props
  const cssClass = tag === 'p' && !type ? 'p' : type
  const Tag: React.ElementType = tag

  return <Tag className={cx(className, cssClass && cssClass.toLowerCase())}>{children}</Tag>
}

export default Text
export { default as Link } from './Link'
